decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.  Reason for Condition: To comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - The garage(s) and/or car parking space(s) shown on the approved drawing 090/04 shall be provided before commencement of the use of the land or building(s) hereby permitted and thereafter shall be kept free from obstruction and shall not be used for purposes other than the parking of vehicles in conjunction with the development hereby permitted.  Reason for Condition: To ensure the provision of adequate off-street parking in order to prevent additional parking in surrounding streets which could be detrimental to amenity and prejudical to highway safety.

Condition : 3 - Details of the materials to be used for external surfaces of the building/extension shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority before any work is commenced.  Reason for Condition: To ensure a satisfactory appearance for the development.

Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning General Development Order 1988 (or any Order revoking or re-enacting this Order) no buildings, extensions, or alterations permitted by Classes A, B, C and E of Part 1 of the 2nd Schedule of the 1988 Order shall be carried out without the prior permission of the Local Planning Authority.  Reason for Condition: To prevent an overdevelopment, having regard to the restricted nature of the site.

Condition : 5 - The open area around the building(s) as shown on drawing no. 090/04 shall be permanently retained as an amenity space for the occupants of the residential units hereby permitted and shall not be used for any other purpose.  Reason for Condition: To ensure provision of adequate amenity space and to protect the amenities of adjoining residents.

Condition : 6 - Before any part of the development hereby permitted is first occupied a means of enclosure of a height and type to be approved by the Local Planning Authority shall be erected along the boundaries of the site and shall be permanently maintained thereafter.  Reason for condition:In the interests of the privacy of adjoining residents.
description: ERECTION OF DETACHED TWO STOREY HOUSE
